calculatedMetrics.name: PowerAvailable
calculatedMetrics.description: Total deployed power (KW) for datacenters with status Deployed or Shell.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: ROUND(SUM(TotalPower) / 1000.0, 2) AS [TotalDeployed(KW)] WHERE OperationalStatus in ('Deployed', 'Shell') and PropertyType = 'Colocation'

calculatedMetrics.name: TotalDeployed
calculatedMetrics.description: Total deployed power (KW) for datacenters with status Deployed or Shell.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: ROUND(SUM(TotalPower) / 1000.0, 2) AS [TotalDeployed(KW)] WHERE OperationalStatus in ('Deployed', 'Shell') and PropertyType = 'Colocation'

calculatedMetrics.name: AvailableDeployed
calculatedMetrics.description: Available deployed power (KW). Uses TotalPower for Deployed sites.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: Sum of TotalPowerAvailable for all datacenters with OperationalStatus as Deployed and PropertyType as 'Colocation'

calculatedMetrics.name: UnderConstructionPower
calculatedMetrics.description: Power pipeline (KW)
calculatedMetrics.calculation: Sum of TotalPower for all datacenters with OperationalStatus as Planned or Under Construction and PropertyType as 'Colocation'

calculatedMetrics.name: Land
calculatedMetrics.description: Land bank power (KW). Includes sites with OperationalStatus = Land.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: Sum of TotalPower for all datacenters with OperationalStatus as Land and PropertyType as 'Colocation'

calculatedMetrics.name: LiveInventory
calculatedMetrics.description: Live inventory power (KW) for internal deployed sites.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: Sum of TotalPower for all datacenters with Internal = 'True' and OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' and PropertyType as 'Colocation'

calculatedMetrics.name: VacantInventory
calculatedMetrics.description: Vacant inventory power (KW) for internal deployed sites.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: Sum of TotalPowerAvailable for all datacenters with Internal = 'True' and OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' and PropertyType as 'Colocation'

calculatedMetrics.name: LiveRaisedSpace
calculatedMetrics.description: Live raised space (SQFT) for internal deployed sites.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: Sum of TotalRaisedSQFT for all datacenters with Internal = 'True' and OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' and PropertyType as 'Colocation'

calculatedMetrics.name: VacantRaisedSpace
calculatedMetrics.description: Vacant raised space (SQFT) for internal deployed sites.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: Sum of AvailableRaisedSQFT for all datacenters with Internal = 'True' and OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' and PropertyType as 'Colocation'

calculatedMetrics.name: TotalCurrentMarketPower
calculatedMetrics.description: Total Market power
calculatedMetrics.calculation: WITH ExpansionPower AS (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN LEFT(ExpansionDate, 4) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) THEN totalpower END) / 1000.0 AS Power WHERE PropertyType = 'Colocation' AND OperationalStatus IN ('Deployed', 'UnderConstruction', 'Announced', 'Planned', 'Shell', 'Land', 'Unknown')), DeployedPower AS (SELECT SUM(totalpower) / 1000.0 AS Power WHERE OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' AND PropertyType = 'Colocation') SELECT ExpansionPower.Power + DeployedPower.Power AS TotalCurrentMarketPower FROM ExpansionPower CROSS JOIN DeployedPower;

calculatedMetrics.name: CurrentMarketSharePower
calculatedMetrics.description: Market share by power (%) for specific providers, regions, and time periods.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: CurrentMarketSharePower=(TotalCurrentMarketPower where ProviderName=<provider_name> * 100)/TotalCurrentMarketPower

calculatedMetrics.name: TotalFutureMarketPower
calculatedMetrics.description: Total Future Market Power
calculatedMetrics.calculation: WITH ExpansionYearPower AS (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN LEFT(ExpansionDate, 4) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) THEN totalpower END) / 1000.0 AS Power WHERE PropertyType = 'Colocation' AND OperationalStatus IN ('Deployed', 'UnderConstruction', 'Announced', 'Planned', 'Shell', 'Land', 'Unknown')), DeployedPower AS (SELECT SUM(totalpower) / 1000.0 AS Power WHERE OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' AND PropertyType = 'Colocation'), PipelineNoDatePower AS (SELECT SUM(totalpower) / 1000.0 AS Power WHERE PropertyType = 'Colocation' AND ExpansionDate IS NULL) SELECT ExpansionYearPower.Power + DeployedPower.Power + PipelineNoDatePower.Power AS TotalFutureMarketPower FROM ExpansionYearPower CROSS JOIN DeployedPower CROSS JOIN PipelineNoDatePower

calculatedMetrics.name: FutureMarketSharePower
calculatedMetrics.description: Market share by power (%) for specific providers, regions, and time periods.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: FutureMarketSharePower=(TotalFutureMarketPower for selected Provider * 100)/TotalFutureMarketPower

calculatedMetrics.name: TotalPowerUtilized
calculatedMetrics.description: Total utilized power (KW), including deployed power and power from expansions occurring in 2025, excluding self-build facilities.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN ExpansionDate >= '2025-01-01' AND ExpansionDate < '2026-01-01' THEN TotalPowerUtilized ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' THEN TotalPowerUtilized ELSE 0 END)) / 1000.0 AS TotalPowerUtilizedKW FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE COALESCE(PropertyType, 'NA') <> 'self-build';

calculatedMetrics.name: OccupiedPowerMarketShare
calculatedMetrics.description: Percentage of total power capacity that is currently utilized across the market.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: SELECT ROUND((SUM(TotalPowerUtilized) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalPower), 0)) * 100, 2) AS OccupiedMarketSharePercent FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE COALESCE(PropertyType, 'NA') <> 'self-build';

calculatedMetrics.name: MarketSharePower
calculatedMetrics.description: Market share by Power (%) for specific providers, regions, and time periods.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: WITH ProviderPower AS (SELECT SUM(TotalPower) AS Power FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE OperationalStatus='Deployed' AND PropertyType='Colocation' AND DataCenterProviderName=[selected_provider] AND ExpansionDate [time_condition]), TotalPower AS (SELECT SUM(TotalPower) AS Power FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE OperationalStatus='Deployed' AND PropertyType='Colocation' AND ExpansionDate [time_condition]) SELECT ROUND((ProviderPower.Power / NULLIF(TotalPower.Power, 0)) * 100, 2) AS [Market Share Power %] FROM ProviderPower CROSS JOIN TotalPower;

calculatedMetrics.name: TotalCurrentMarketSpace
calculatedMetrics.description: Total current market space, including deployed space and space from expansions occurring in 2025, excluding self-build facilities.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN ExpansionDate >= '2025-01-01' AND ExpansionDate < '2026-01-01' THEN TotalRaisedSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 1000.0 + SUM(CASE WHEN OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' THEN TotalRentableSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764) AS TotalCurrentMarketSpace FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE COALESCE(PropertyType, 'NA') <> 'self-build';

calculatedMetrics.name: CurrentMarketShareSpace
calculatedMetrics.description: Market share of space (%) based on total current market space for selected providers, regions, and time periods.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: WITH ProviderSpace AS (SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN ExpansionDate >= '2025-01-01' AND ExpansionDate < '2026-01-01' THEN TotalRaisedSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 1000.0 + SUM(CASE WHEN OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' THEN TotalRentableSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764) AS Space FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE DataCenterProviderName = [selected_provider] AND COALESCE(PropertyType,'NA') <> 'self-build'), TotalSpace AS (SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN ExpansionDate >= '2025-01-01' AND ExpansionDate < '2026-01-01' THEN TotalRaisedSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 1000.0 + SUM(CASE WHEN OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' THEN TotalRentableSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764) AS Space FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE COALESCE(PropertyType,'NA') <> 'self-build') SELECT ROUND((ProviderSpace.Space / NULLIF(TotalSpace.Space, 0)) * 100, 2) AS CurrentMarketShareSpacePercent FROM ProviderSpace CROSS JOIN TotalSpace;

calculatedMetrics.name: TotalFutureMarketSpace
calculatedMetrics.description: Total future market space over the next 10 years, including deployed space, dated expansions (2025â€“2035), and pipeline space without expansion dates.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN TRY_CAST(ExpansionDate AS date) >= '2025-01-01' AND TRY_CAST(ExpansionDate AS date) < '2036-01-01' THEN TotalRaisedSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764 + SUM(CASE WHEN OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' THEN TotalRentableSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764 + SUM(CASE WHEN ExpansionDate IS NULL AND OperationalStatus IN ('Planned','Land','Under Construction','Shell','Announced','unknown') AND DataCenterProviderName IS NOT NULL THEN TotalRaisedSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764) AS TotalFutureMarketSpace FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE COALESCE(PropertyType,'NA') <> 'self-build';

calculatedMetrics.name: FutureMarketShareSpace
calculatedMetrics.description: Future market share of space (%) over the next 10 years, including deployed, expansion, and pipeline space.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: WITH ProviderSpace AS (SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN TRY_CAST(ExpansionDate AS date) >= '2025-01-01' AND TRY_CAST(ExpansionDate AS date) < '2036-01-01' THEN TotalRaisedSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764 + SUM(CASE WHEN OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' THEN TotalRentableSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764 + SUM(CASE WHEN ExpansionDate IS NULL AND OperationalStatus IN ('Planned','Land','Under Construction','Shell','Announced','unknown') AND DataCenterProviderName IS NOT NULL THEN TotalRaisedSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764) AS Space FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE DataCenterProviderName = [selected_provider] AND COALESCE(PropertyType,'NA') <> 'self-build'), TotalSpace AS (SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN TRY_CAST(ExpansionDate AS date) >= '2025-01-01' AND TRY_CAST(ExpansionDate AS date) < '2036-01-01' THEN TotalRaisedSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764 + SUM(CASE WHEN OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' THEN TotalRentableSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764 + SUM(CASE WHEN ExpansionDate IS NULL AND OperationalStatus IN ('Planned','Land','Under Construction','Shell','Announced','unknown') AND DataCenterProviderName IS NOT NULL THEN TotalRaisedSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764) AS Space FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE COALESCE(PropertyType,'NA') <> 'self-build') SELECT ROUND((ProviderSpace.Space / NULLIF(TotalSpace.Space, 0)) * 100, 2) AS FutureMarketShareSpacePercent FROM ProviderSpace CROSS JOIN TotalSpace;

calculatedMetrics.name: AvailableMarketSpace
calculatedMetrics.description: Total available market space based on available rentable space from deployed facilities.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' THEN AvailableRentableSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764 AS AvailableMarketSpace FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE COALESCE(PropertyType,'NA') <> 'self-build';

calculatedMetrics.name: OccupiedSpaceMarketShare
calculatedMetrics.description: Percentage of total current market space that is occupied.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: WITH TotalSpace AS (SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN ExpansionDate >= '2025-01-01' AND ExpansionDate < '2026-01-01' THEN TotalRaisedSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 1000.0 + SUM(CASE WHEN OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' THEN TotalRentableSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764) AS Space FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE COALESCE(PropertyType,'NA') <> 'self-build'), AvailableSpace AS (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' THEN AvailableRentableSQFT ELSE 0 END) / 10.764 AS Space FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE COALESCE(PropertyType,'NA') <> 'self-build') SELECT ROUND(((TotalSpace.Space - AvailableSpace.Space) / NULLIF(TotalSpace.Space, 0)) * 100, 2) AS OccupiedSpaceMarketSharePercent FROM TotalSpace CROSS JOIN AvailableSpace;

calculatedMetrics.name: MarketShareSpace
calculatedMetrics.description: Market share by space (%) for specific providers, regions, and time periods.
calculatedMetrics.calculation: WITH ProviderSpace AS (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' THEN TotalRentableSQFT ELSE TotalRaisedSQFT END) AS Space FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE DataCenterProviderName = [selected_provider] AND OperationalStatus IN ('Deployed', 'UnderConstruction', 'Announced', 'Planned', 'Shell', 'Land', 'Unknown') AND PropertyType = 'Colocation' AND ExpansionDate [time_condition]), TotalSpace AS (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN OperationalStatus = 'Deployed' THEN TotalRentableSQFT ELSE TotalRaisedSQFT END) AS Space FROM [3_PRP].[V_MID_DATACENTER_SUPPLY] WHERE OperationalStatus IN ('Deployed', 'UnderConstruction', 'Announced', 'Planned', 'Shell', 'Land', 'Unknown') AND PropertyType = 'Colocation' AND ExpansionDate [time_condition]) SELECT ROUND((ProviderSpace.Space / NULLIF(TotalSpace.Space, 0)) * 100, 2) AS [Market Share Space %] FROM ProviderSpace CROSS JOIN TotalSpace;

description: Global capacity reporting view providing site-level visibility into vacant, under-construction, and expiring data center capacity across markets, properties, and regions for supply and availability analysis.

columns.name: Market
columns.meaning: Primary market or metro area of the data center site

columns.name: Country
columns.meaning: Country where the data center site is located

columns.name: State
columns.meaning: State or province of the data center site, if applicable

columns.name: SiteCode
columns.meaning: Unique site or campus code identifying the data center location

columns.name: Property
columns.meaning: Property or facility name and address description

columns.name: VacantScale
columns.meaning: Available vacant capacity designated for hyperscale or large-scale deployments

columns.name: VacantColo
columns.meaning: Available vacant capacity designated for colocation offerings

columns.name: ScaleUnderConstruction
columns.meaning: Hyperscale capacity currently under construction

columns.name: ColoUnderConstruction
columns.meaning: Colocation capacity currently under construction

columns.name: ExpiringLease
columns.meaning: Capacity expected to become available due to expiring leases

columns.name: AvailableShell
columns.meaning: Indicator or count of available shell space ready for fit-out

columns.name: LandBank
columns.meaning: Land bank capacity available for future development

columns.name: GeoId
columns.meaning: Geographic identifier linking the site to a standardized location reference

columns.name: GlobalRegion
columns.meaning: High-level global region classification

columns.name: BusinessRegion
columns.meaning: Business-defined regional grouping used for reporting and analysis

columns.name: GlobalRegionID
columns.meaning: Numeric identifier for the global region

columns.name: BusinessRegionID
columns.meaning: Numeric identifier for the business region

columns.name: GrandTotal
columns.meaning: Total available capacity across all vacancy and pipeline categories for the site

columns.name: SurrogateKey
columns.meaning: Composite surrogate key combining market, site, property, and regional attributes for uniqueness

description: Data hallâ€“level supply view providing detailed visibility into space, power, cabinet, and cage availability and utilization within individual data halls across properties, markets, and regions for granular capacity analysis.

columns.name: mid_propertyname
columns.meaning: Property or campus name where the data hall is located

columns.name: mid_address
columns.meaning: Physical address of the data center property

columns.name: mid_operationalstatus
columns.meaning: Operational status of the data hall or facility

columns.name: mid_suitecondition
columns.meaning: Condition classification of the data hall suite

columns.name: mid_suitestatus
columns.meaning: Numeric status indicator for the data hall suite

columns.name: mid_availablespace
columns.meaning: Total available space within the data hall

columns.name: mid_cabinetavailable
columns.meaning: Number of cabinets currently available in the data hall

columns.name: mid_cabinetsold
columns.meaning: Number of cabinets already sold or allocated

columns.name: mid_cageavailable
columns.meaning: Available cage space within the data hall

columns.name: mid_cagesold
columns.meaning: Cage space already sold or allocated

columns.name: mid_grosscabinets
columns.meaning: Total gross cabinet count in the data hall

columns.name: mid_grosscage
columns.meaning: Total gross cage area in the data hall

columns.name: mid_totalpower
columns.meaning: Total installed power capacity for the data hall

columns.name: mid_totalpoweravailable
columns.meaning: Available power capacity remaining in the data hall

columns.name: mid_totalpowerpercentutilized
columns.meaning: Percentage of total power capacity currently utilized

columns.name: mid_totalpowerutilized
columns.meaning: Amount of power capacity currently utilized

columns.name: mid_totalrsf
columns.meaning: Total raised square feet within the data hall

columns.name: mid_sourceavailablespace
columns.meaning: Source-system reported available space for the data hall

columns.name: mid_sourcetotalpoweravailable
columns.meaning: Source-system reported available power capacity

columns.name: mid_availableraisedsqft
columns.meaning: Available raised floor square footage

columns.name: mid_totalraisedsqft
columns.meaning: Total raised floor square footage

columns.name: mid_datahallid
columns.meaning: Unique identifier for the data hall

columns.name: mid_datahallname
columns.meaning: Human-readable name or number of the data hall

columns.name: mid_geoid
columns.meaning: Geographic identifier linking the data hall to a standardized location reference

columns.name: GlobalRegion
columns.meaning: High-level global region classification

columns.name: BusinessRegion
columns.meaning: Business-defined regional grouping used for reporting

columns.name: GlobalRegionID
columns.meaning: Numeric identifier for the global region

columns.name: BusinessRegionID
columns.meaning: Numeric identifier for the business region

columns.name: Market
columns.meaning: Primary market or metro area of the data center

columns.name: Country
columns.meaning: Country where the data hall is located

columns.name: State
columns.meaning: State or province where the data hall is located

description: Historical snapshot view of data center supply metrics captured for previous quarters, enabling quarter-over-quarter analysis of space and power capacity by ownership type, product type, provider, geography, and operational status.
grain: One row per data center provider, market, operational status, and snapshot date.

columns.name: mid_ownershiptype
columns.meaning: Ownership classification of the data center asset

columns.name: mid_producttype
columns.meaning: Type of data center product offering

columns.name: mid_GlobalRegion
columns.meaning: High-level global geographic region

columns.name: mid_BusinessRegion
columns.meaning: Business-defined regional grouping for reporting

columns.name: mid_Country
columns.meaning: Country where the data center is located

columns.name: mid_Market
columns.meaning: Primary metro or market of the data center location

columns.name: mid_Stateorprovince
columns.meaning: State or province of the data center location, when applicable

columns.name: mid_operationalstatus
columns.meaning: Operational lifecycle status of the data center

columns.name: mid_totalrsf
columns.meaning: Total rentable square footage of the data center

columns.name: mid_availablespace
columns.meaning: Available rentable space at the time of the snapshot

columns.name: mid_availableraisedsqft
columns.meaning: Available raised floor square footage

columns.name: mid_totalraisedsqft
columns.meaning: Total raised floor square footage

columns.name: mid_totalpower
columns.meaning: Total installed power capacity for the data center

columns.name: mid_totalpoweravailable
columns.meaning: Remaining available power capacity at the time of the snapshot

columns.name: mid_datacenterprovidername
columns.meaning: Name of the data center provider or operator

columns.name: mid_internaldatacenter
columns.meaning: Indicator showing whether the data center is internally owned or managed

columns.name: Snapshot Date
columns.meaning: Snapshot date representing the reporting quarter for the record

columns.name: SurrogateKey
columns.meaning: System-generated composite key uniquely identifying a snapshot record
